data.meta_description: Juke It (Remix) Lyrics by Drew Sidora. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
pre-pretty girls deep and erotic who rollin (with me) some slip in slide up in the chi (you wanna see it) we bout it we bout it we bout it (chicago leanin) you got it you got it you got it (i know they like it in the south) they hear it up (north) they like it in the (east) they do it in the (west) he (twirk it out) she (twirk it out) we (twirk it out) everybody ready... Drop and do the dance, come on and do the dance, put yo hands on yo pants, you like the way I do it yo, watch me; juke it juke it juke it juke it (everybody here we go) juke it juke it juke it juke it ju ju ju ju... ju ju All night up in the club but now (we leavin) All the boys tryna keep up (they know we speedin) parking lot parking lot parking lot (its where we meetin) up in the parking lot pop and lock (i know they like it in the south) they hear it up (north) they like it in the (east) they do it in the (west) he (twirk it out) she (twirk it out) we (twirk it out) everybody ready... 1x Juke ya girl, Juke ya girl, slow it down and Juke ya girl Juke ya girl, Juke ya girl, get real close and Juke ya girl Juke it while you lookin back, Juke it while you lookin back Juke it Juke it Ju-Juke it Baby come on, this is your song records gonna play, all night long So when the beat drops We goin on and on and on and on and we aint goin home, unless we: 2xs ju ju ju ju... ju ju Writer(s): Cainon Lamb, Drew Sidora
